description: Include an external adaptive script, json, or template to be compiled and returned.

parameters.description: The path of the file to include, which will be resolved using rootFilePaths.
parameters.name: file

parameters.description:
The compile type, used by the parser to determine how to compile the data.
For example, 'json', 'relaxed_json', 'script', 'template'
parameters.name: compileType
